ui.title: Re-classify custom LC/LU classes
ui.description: This module will help you to translate your own land cover / land user (LC/LU) maps into the six IPCC classes. </br> In the following input cell you can select the assets stored in your Google Earth Engine account, you can use whether raster (image) or feature collection (table) assets, click over the 'Get attributes' button and a table will show up lettting you select the corresponding class.

remap.label: Select a LC/LU GEE asset (Feature or Image)

error.error_type: The input asset must be an instace of one of ee.Image, or  ee.Feature.
error.no_code_col: Please select at least one column name or band.
